description: Additional fenestration to basement level, east elevation; introduction of double glazing to retained Chapel building windows; reduction in size of west elevation window to listed building; omission of Gas flues to ridge and reinstatement of lead ridge roll detail; rooflight opened up to create garden room, west roof pitch; reinstatement of historic detailing to cupola base; amendments to roof structure; reconfiguration of rooftop plant to roof of new build rear extension and plant in garden in connection with the omission of the approved CHP system and its replacement with a non-combustion heat-pump based system; and additional fenestration to west elevation of new build extension in connection with alterations and extensions including the demolition and reconstruction of rear extension, excavation of a basement floor in connection with the conversion of the building into five residential apartments.
